model.name: LVxNBA Letters Crewneck
model.disambiguatingDescription: Warm and comfortable, this crewneck top is adorned with lettering that references the typefaces of different NBA teams. It is fashioned in a regular fit from responsibly-sourced merino wool. Details include an embroidered NBA patch at the bottom of the front panel, and knitted ribs at the collar, cuffs and waist.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Wool
  • White
  • Regular Fit
  • Model measurements : chest 32’’ / 82 cm, height 6’’ / 183 cm
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Made in Italy
